name: Wall of Text
imagePrompt: A screen overflowing with dense text and analytical charts, so much so that some words are spilling out onto the surrounding environment like digital rivers, a single exasperated emoji peeking from the corner.
flavorText: Sometimes, you just need to lay out all your thoughts. TL;DR: I have no idea either but here's 47 paragraphs.

spellEffect.description: Draw 2 cards. 'What the heck' are we building here?
